props.name: createLinkText
props.desc: The default text for the create link prompt

props.name: defaultLinkValue
props.desc: The default value for the create link prompt (defaults to http:/ /)

props.name: toolbars
props.desc: Array of toolbars. - defaults to just the Standard one

events.name: activate
events.desc:
Fires when the editor is first receives the focus. Any insertion must wait
until after this event.

events.name: beforepush
events.desc:
Fires before the iframe editor is updated with content from the textarea. Return false
to cancel the push.

events.name: beforesync
events.desc:
Fires before the textarea is updated with content from the editor iframe. Return false
to cancel the sync.

events.name: editmodechange
events.desc: Fires when the editor switches edit modes

events.name: editorevent
events.desc: Fires when on any editor (mouse up/down cursor movement etc.) - used for toolbar hooks.

events.name: initialize
events.desc: Fires when the editor is fully initialized (including the iframe)

events.name: push
events.desc: Fires when the iframe editor is updated with content from the textarea.

events.name: sync
events.desc: Fires when the textarea is updated with content from the editor iframe.
